orig_text:
OptDataLenDFF  - 8-bit unsigned integer.  Length of the option data
      field of this option, in octets, as specified in [RFC2460].  This
      value is set to 2 (two).
correct_text:
OptDataLenDFF  - 8-bit unsigned integer.  Length of the option data
      field of this option, in octets, as specified in [RFC2460].  This
      value is set to 3 (three).
notes: In an earlier revision of the draft, the header was two bytes long. As a result of the IESG evaluation, the header became one octet longer (to include the version field), but I missed to update the header length.
